heading: The Stoic Challenge
content: On arriving home, I concluded that the test was over, so I graded my performance. I had done quite well, I thought, in remaining calm and collected despite the various provocations I had been presented with.

Get Your Shit Together shows you how to set goals, how to push through small annoyances and thorny obstacles to meet those goals, and then how to imagine and achieve even bigger goals that you may not, until now, have thought possible.
heading: Get Your Sh*t Together

content: what you need instead is a full-fledged philosophy of technology use, rooted in your deep values, that provides clear answers to the questions of what tools you should use and how you should use them and, equally important, enables you to confidently ignore everything else.
heading: Digital Minimalism

content: The first task of Blink is to convince you of a simple fact: decisions made very quickly can be every bit as good as decisions made cautiously and deliberately.
heading: Blink

content: Letâ€™s begin your transformation by designing your first intentional habit. When installing new habits, concentrate on one at a time to avoid being overwhelmed.
heading: No-Fail Habits
